text:
Learn how to determine the domain and range from a table and from a graph

\begin{array}{|c|c|}\n\hline x & y \\\n\hline-3 & 16 \\\n\hline-2 & 9 \\\n\hline-1 & 4 \\\n\hline 0 & 1 \\\n\hline 1 & 0 \\\n\hline 2 & 1 \\\n\hline 3 & 4 \\\n\hline\n\end{array}[imath]\hline x & y [/imath] [imath]\hline-3 & 16 [/imath] [imath]\hline-2 & 9 [/imath] [imath]\hline-1 & 4 [/imath] [imath]\hline 0 & 1 [/imath] [imath]\hline 1 & 0 [/imath] [imath]\hline 2 & 1 [/imath] [imath]\hline 3 & 4 [/imath] [imath]\hline[/imath]
